::Striker::

Striker's eyes narrow, the bot sneering at Prebon. "You think Zardus 
will be defeated by a simple chip and a gestalt? Or Megatron for that 
matter? You underestimate both."

A growl escapes his lips as he watches Spears lean her head against 
Prebon's shoulder, his emotion circuits reactivating. Suddenly, both 
his shoulder blasters take aim at Prebon, one firing at the bot's
head 
and the other at his chest. Striker was in a fury, rational thought 
mostly gone from his head.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> OOC: Sorry Yanshosh. I thought he said it out loud. I'll just say
in 
> this post that it was a guess, so that if it was right Striker 
> would've felt without that option. And the door to Striker's cell
is 
> open right now. Ignatius opened it. And Code, their in a mountain 
> with may tunnels and their at the top. You can't just talk, cause 
> they won't here you. Scan the mountain for technology and when you 
> find stuff just send a comm message. No word on Bob Skir yet. 
> Probably forgot about us.
> 
> Trainers
> 
> Prebon gazed at Spears
> 
> "I don't want to have to give you the order, but it's all up to 
> Striker here."
> 
> Prebon looked at him. He was hoping Striker would do something when 
> he said he knew about his self destruct program, so Prebon would 
know 
> if he really has one on, but he didn't flinch. He could probably
put 
> Striker out now, but he wouldn't know if he would explode or not.
He 
> had to go with what he had.
> 
> "Striker, you don't understand, do you? The Maximals are only my 
> first plan. If that fails, I'm sure their are other groups that 
would 
> fall for it. The minute you leave this ship though, Savage would be 
> waiting. And he wouldn't be happy. He hates you with all his soul, 
> and he's nearly killed you before. He'll put you in stasis lock,
and 
> than you explode. He'll probably get really hurt, but he's tough
and 
> will survive after rehibilitation. It's not worth it Striker. You 
can 
> go free. And I also made a promise to Spears that if she serves me 
> well in the recent future, I may release her. This is the only 
chance 
> you'll get! I'm not an evil sorcerer. I'm only looking out for my 
> groups best interests. This is your only chane of survival and
love. 
> Take it!"
> 
______________________________________________________________________
> 
> Vulois
> 
> Vulois looked at Child.
> 
> "Yes I know. We have to work, or all is lost."
> 
> He turned back to Windrazor, Terradive and Afterburner.
> 
> "I'll show you. Follow me." Vulois entered the base with Child
still 
> in his arms.
> 
______________________________________________________________________
> Starscream/Zardus
> 
> Starscream.
> 
> "Yes, Lord Zardus!" He turned to Gotron.
> 
> "You've got to go help some Alliance guys beat Maximals. I'll meet 
> you back here when we're ready for battle."
> 
> "Got it!"
> 
> Starscream sent a message to Phobia.
> 
> "Phobia, it's Starscream. Zardus has agreed to loan us the entire 
> Oblitercon force for our battle. They form a giant bot, remember? 
But 
> in return for this I have to go fight in one of their battles. I 
will 
> contact you when I come back to the Alliance base."
> 
> Starscream left for the battle.
> 
> Gotron sent his own message.
> 
> "Wheeljack, this is Gotron. Zardus told me to aid you in retrieving 
> the probe. What are your
